description: A philosophical rewrite of the Ra Material (Law of One) as accessible narrative. Explore cosmology, the Creator, densities, and the purpose of existence.

content: Teachings received by Don, Carla, and Jim in the early 80s, transformed into accessible philosophical narrative. Rewritten with AI assistance.

nav.notesEmpty: Click any highlighted term in the text to see its definition here.
